hero.name: Miguel Toyas Pernichi
hero.title: Freelance Web Developer
hero.subtitle: Building modern React applications and full-stack web solutions for businesses

about.title: About Me
about.description: Freelance web developer specializing in React applications and full-stack solutions. I help businesses build modern, scalable web applications that deliver results. With experience serving thousands of users, I bring both technical expertise and business understanding to every project.
about.description_2: I work with businesses of all sizes to create custom web solutions. Whether you need a complete web application, an e-commerce platform, or a modern company website, I deliver fast, reliable results using the latest technologies like React, TypeScript, and modern backend frameworks.
about.description_3: Based in Granada, I work with clients worldwide. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese, ensuring clear communication throughout your project. I focus on delivering high-quality solutions that work reliably and scale with your business needs.

job1.title: Frontend Developer
job1.description: Engineered complex business functionality for healthcare platform serving 20,000+ weekly users, implementing data processing logic and critical workflows. Built system integrations and API implementations with React and TypeScript, ensuring regulatory compliance in medical environments. Boosted testing coverage from 1.2% to 35% using Jest and GitHub Actions. Collaborated with international teams across Dublin, Sydney, Bangalore, and San Diego to deliver features for both public platform and internal admin tools supporting healthcare providers.

job2.title: Teacher Assistant | Full Stack Developer
job2.description: Mentored 50+ students in React, Python, Flask, achieving 90% completion rate. Delivered technical lectures on React hooks, database design, and API development. Developed supplementary coding exercises and production-ready projects to enhance learning outcomes.

job3.title: Full Stack Developer
job3.description: Implemented features using Elixir and Phoenix for scalable web platform. Optimized database queries and backend processes with PostgreSQL. Collaborated with cross-functional team to improve system performance and user experience using LiveView and TailwindCSS.

project1.title: EquiRoster - AI-Powered Workforce Scheduling
project1.description: Founding and leading development of EquiRoster, an AI-powered workforce scheduling platform for the hospitality industry. Managing a team of 4 developers while conducting market validation with 10+ restaurant managers. Building comprehensive scheduling solution with workforce optimization algorithms and intuitive management interface.

project2.title: LIQUIBOXES - E-commerce Platform
project2.description: Led development team for innovative e-commerce platform featuring personalized mystery boxes and vendor management. Built comprehensive solution with secure payment processing (Stripe), real-time inventory tracking, and personalized recommendation algorithms. Awarded Best Project at 4Geeks Academy.

project3.title: YO LO CUIDO - Pet Care Platform
project3.description: Developed responsive platform connecting pet owners with caregivers using React and modern development practices. Implemented custom hooks, Context API for state management, real-time notifications, and secure user authentication with intuitive booking system.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Ready to bring your web project to life? I'm available for freelance work and excited to help your business succeed online. Let's discuss how we can build something amazing together.
contact.description.2: Whether you need a complete web application, modern company website, or custom React solution, I'm here to help. Fast delivery, modern technology stack, and bilingual communication in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. Let's start your project today.
contact.name: Miguel Toyas Pernichi
